body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Philip Gonzales and the customer's name is Michelle Brooks.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Philip Gonzales, and I'm with MetaCar, the premier car rental agency. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Philip, I'm Michelle Brooks. I'm feeling a little frustrated with my recent rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Michelle. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Can you tell me more about what went wrong?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I reserved a vehicle, but when I arrived, the car wasn't available. It really messed up my plans.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how important it is to have a vehicle ready when you need it. Let me help you with this. Could you please provide the confirmation number for your reservation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Michelle. And could you also provide me with your phone number so I can ensure we have the correct contact details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my number is three zero three five six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you! I will look into your reservation and see what went wrong. We want to make this right for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Philip. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle! Thank you for your time today, and I will get back to you shortly with a resolution. Have a great day!
